pkgmetadata.longdescription: Utilities to Extract and Analyse Text Data from the Emergency Nutrition Network Forum // The Emergency Nutrition Network or en-net forum is the go to online forum for field practitioners requiring prompt technical advice for operational challenges for which answers are not readily accessible in current guidelines. The questions and the corresponding answers raised within en-net can provide insight into what the key topics of discussion are within the nutrition sector. This package provides utility functions for the extraction, processing and analysis of text data from the online forum.
